question: The American Revolution took place in the 18th century.
The Great Wall of China was built to keep out invading armies.
Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo.
The Titanic sank in the Pacific Ocean.
The Renaissance was a period of cultural and artistic rebirth in Europe.
The Cold War was primarily a conflict between the United States and Germany.
Queen Elizabeth I was known as the 'Virgin Queen.'
The Berlin Wall fell in 1989, leading to the reunification of Germany.
The Industrial Revolution began in the 19th century.
The Magna Carta was signed in the 13th century.
